column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Meh is a decent way to describe this place. I have a friend who thinks this place has the best ramen
column2: but that doesn't matter because he's wrong. Another friend and I
column3: who we fancy ourselves to be quite connoisseurs of food
column4: thought this place hovered around PAR. Compared to other places in Houston
column5: this may be a better option for ramen. But compared to other places in Texas in general for ramen
column6: it's probably in the middle of that list. For those visiting from DFW
column7: Tei An is still much better than this place but this place is better than Hanabi (which sucks so that doesn't say much haha). But back to the beginning.
